sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnrwardmanage ( rward_id , rwardwnr_id , rward_code , rward_de , rward_nm , pblen_cn , sanctner_id , confm_at , sanctn_dt , return_resn , atch_file_id , infrml_sanctn_id , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #rwardId# , #rwardwnrId# , #rwardCode# , #rwardDe# , #rwardNm# , #pblenCn# , #sanctnerId# , #confmAt# , #sanctnDt# , #returnResn# , #atchFileId# , #infrmlSanctnId# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnrwardmanage SET rward_id = #rwardId# , rwardwnr_id = #rwardwnrId# , rward_code = #rwardCode# , rward_de = #rwardDe# , rward_nm = #rwardNm# , pblen_cn = #pblenCn# , sanctner_id = #sanctnerId# , confm_at = #confmAt# , sanctn_dt = #sanctnDt# , return_resn = #returnResn# , atch_file_id = #atchFileId# , infrml_sanctn_id = #infrmlSanctnId# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND rward_id = #rwardId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnrwardmanage WHERE 1 = 1 AND rward_id = #rwardId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT rward_id , rwardwnr_id , rward_code , rward_de , rward_nm , pblen_cn , sanctner_id , confm_at , sanctn_dt , return_resn , atch_file_id , infrml_sanctn_id , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM COMTNRWARDMANAGE WHERE rward_id = #rwardId#

SELECT A.RWARD_ID , A.RWARDWNR_ID , A.RWARD_CODE , A.RWARD_DE , A.RWARD_NM , A.PBLEN_CN , A.SANCTNER_ID , A.CONFM_AT , A.SANCTN_DT , A.RETURN_RESN , A.ATCH_FILE_ID , A.INFRML_SANCTN_ID , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM ( SELECT RWARD_ID , RWARDWNR_ID , RWARD_CODE , RWARD_DE , RWARD_NM , PBLEN_CN , SANCTNER_ID , CONFM_AT , SANCTN_DT , RETURN_RESN , ATCH_FILE_ID , INFRML_SANCTN_ID , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , ROWNUM FROM COMTNRWARDMANAGE WHERE 1=1
RWARD_ID = #searchKeyword#
RWARDWNR_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY RWARD_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNRWARDMANAGE WHERE 1=1
RWARD_ID = #searchKeyword#
RWARDWNR_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
